projectDescription: Developing a sustainable neighbourhood with green homes and renewable energy sources, aiming to reduce the environmental footprint and promote sustainable living.

milestones.title: Title: Project Planning and Design
milestones.description: Conduct a feasibility study, Develop a project plan, Design sustainable houses and layout of the neighbourhood, Identify potential renewable energy sources, Obtain necessary permits and approvals
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of the total project budget to be paid upon completion of this milestone.

milestones.title: Title: Procurement and Site Preparation
milestones.description: Procure construction materials and renewable energy equipment, Prepare the site for construction, Set up temporary facilities
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of the total project budget to be paid upon completion of this milestone.

milestones.title: Title: Construction of Green Homes
milestones.description: Construct the green homes as per the design, Install energy-efficient appliances and systems, Implement waste management systems
milestones.paymentDetails: : 40% of the total project budget to be paid in installments upon completion of predetermined stages of this milestone.

milestones.title: Title: Installation of Renewable Energy Sources
milestones.description: Install solar panels, wind turbines, or other renewable energy sources, Connect the renewable energy sources to the homes, Test the system for efficiency and safety
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total project budget to be paid upon completion of this milestone.

milestones.title: Title: Project Finalization and Handover
milestones.description: Conduct final inspection and testing, Address any issues or defects, Obtain final approvals, Handover the project to the client
milestones.paymentDetails: : 15% of the total project budget to be paid upon completion of this milestone.
